properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 12 at 2:11PM PST until February 12 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Rough bar conditions expected.

- GENERAL SEAS...6 to 8 ft through Thursday morning.

- FIRST EBB...Very strong around 715 PM Wednesday. Seas around
12 ft with breakers possible.

* WHERE...In the Main Channel of the Columbia River Bar.

* WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 10 PM PST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft
especially when navigating in or near harbor entrances.
properties.instruction:
Small craft should use extreme caution when navigating in or near
harbor entrances.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 PM PST THIS EVENING
